name: intermountain
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between or in an area between mountains, especially in the region of the US between the Rocky Mountains and the Sierra Nevada or Cascade Ranges: the park service's director for the intermountain region Rain will be spreading into the intermountain states later today.
More examplesFewer examplesA new report suggests how the intermountain states can best manage their rapid growth.The water-supply picture remained bleak across the intermountain west.Rain showers will stretch from the intermountain west to the east coast.The state government has cut off money for the experimental inter-mountain monorail.
